lead_paragraph: Andre Gray celebrated his maiden Premier League hat-trick as Burnley headed into the New Year sitting comfortably in mid-table after a 4-1 demolition of struggling Sunderland at Turf Moor on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Gray Grabs Hat-Trick as Burnley Thrash Sunderland
headline.main: Gray Grabs Hat-Trick as Burnley Thrash Sunderland

snippet: Andre Gray celebrated his maiden Premier League hat-trick as Burnley headed into the New Year sitting comfortably in mid-table after a 4-1 demolition of struggling Sunderland at Turf Moor on Saturday....
